import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function Sessions({ sessionSelection, toggleSlider, name, sessionDetail }) { return (
{/* Header with tabs */}
{/* Table Header */}
Session Name
Score
Last session
{/* Session List */} {name.map((session) => (
{session.type}
{session.session_name}
= 8 ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-600' : session.entries[session.entries.length - 1].score >= 6 ? 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-600' : 'bg-red-100 text-red-600' }`} > {session.entries[session.entries.length - 1].score}
{session.entries[session.entries.length - 1].last_session}
sessionSelection(session.session_name)} className="flex space-x-2">
))}
); } export default Sessions;
